de.gematik.ti.test.utils.parser

Class ApduParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gematik.ti.test.utils.parser.ApduParser

  • public final class ApduParser
extends java.lang.Object

    Check and convert apdu in bytes-array in a CommandApdu

    Command APDU encoding options: case 1: |CLA|INS|P1 |P2 | len = 4 case 2s: |CLA|INS|P1 |P2 |LE | len = 5 case 3s: |CLA|INS|P1 |P2 |LC |…​BODY…​| len = 6..260 case 4s: |CLA|INS|P1 |P2 |LC |…​BODY…​|LE | len = 7..261 case 2e: |CLA|INS|P1 |P2 |00 |LE1|LE2| len = 7 case 3e: |CLA|INS|P1 |P2 |00 |LC1|LC2|…​BODY…​| len = 8..65542 case 4e: |CLA|INS|P1 |P2 |00 |LC1|LC2|…​BODY…​|LE1|LE2| len =10..65544

    LE, LE1, LE2 may be 0x00. LC must not be 0x00 and LC1|LC2 must not be 0x00|0x00
